scriptDesc.scriptNote: Italian semi-cursive script of the 14th century. Mosheh ben Yehudah ben Binyamin: inscribed in the colophon, folio 97r, and marked off on folio 16v.

binding.p: Post-1600. Brown leather. Boxed. Spine: 'Brit. Mus. Additional 26,899.'

history.provenance:
Acquisition:
Giuseppe Almanzi(b. 1801, d. 1860), bibliophile; his manuscript no. 8; his library including 322 medieval Hebrew manuscripts were purchased en bloc by the British Museum in October 1865 for £1,000 through Asher & Co., Berlin bookseller and dealer to the British Museum: inscribed, folio [98v] (fse001v).
